# Class IntentMatcherFactory

Factory class for creating IntentMatcher instances. Provides methods to create intent matchers with different configurations.

##### Index

### Methods

create

## Methods

### `Static`create

  * create(props: [IntentMatcherFactoryInterface](/interfaces/primitives_intent_intent_matcher_factory.IntentMatcherFactoryInterface)): Promise<[IntentMatcher](./primitives_intent_intent_matcher.IntentMatcher)>

Creates a new IntentMatcher instance. Supports different combinations of dependencies (embedder and/or LLM).

#### Parameters

    * props: [IntentMatcherFactoryInterface](/interfaces/primitives_intent_intent_matcher_factory.IntentMatcherFactoryInterface)

Configuration for intent matcher creation

Interface for intent matcher factory parameters.

      * ##### config: [IntentMatcherCreationConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_intent_intent_matcher_creation_config.IntentMatcherCreationConfigInterface)

Configuration for intent matcher creation

      * ##### `Optional`llm?: [LLM](./primitives_llm_llm.LLM)

Optional LLM for LLM-based matching

      * ##### `Optional`textEmbedder?: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)

Optional text embedder for embedding-based matching

#### Returns Promise<[IntentMatcher](./primitives_intent_intent_matcher.IntentMatcher)>

Promise resolving to a new IntentMatcher instance

#### Throws

InworldError if creation fails
